name: Indicon  Enterprises
overview: Indicon Enterprises Ltd is one of India’s container manufacturer and container logistics company. Its manufacturing facilities are proficient to manufacture all types of ISO containers including ISO boxes and specially designed networks like bunk houses, custom built containers, refrigerated containers, etc. for a wide range of industries and services including rail sectors, construction sector, pharmaceuticals, automotive industry, space research, strategic sectors (army, navy and military), Meat and Dairy . Under the brand name of Kargatact, it entails to container rental services for short, medium, and long-term lease across the country. It has a nationwide network with its registered office in Kolkata, Manufacturing Unit in Ranchi, Corporate Office in Delhi and Branch offices in Bangalore and Chennai. KCT Coal Sales, the leading coal-handling agency and the flagship company of the KCT Group of Companies, is the parent company of Indicon Enterprises Ltd. Karam Chand Thapar is the founder of the Thapar Group of Companies in 1929 that turned out to be the second largest coal producer and the most proficient operator of efficient mines in the country, before the pre- nationalization period. Mr. Vikram Thapar, son of Inder Mohan Thapar is the Chairman and Varun Thapar (son of Vikram Thapar) is the Managing Director of the company. The company incorporates the most cutting- edge technology -CAD/CAM, 3-D Design Modeling and Finite Element Analysis software like AutoCAD, Pro-E & ANSYS and functions on a fully connected GRP based refrigerated container. With the country’s most inclusive ISO testing facility, it is capable of performing varied rigorous tests on containers upto 45ft length that has enabled it to provide the most efficient services to its consumers with no scope for dissatisfaction. It is the only company capable of making GRP based refrigerated containers. Varun Thapar, Indicon’s Founder aspires to up the ante by expanding the range of services to Inland Container Deposits (ICD), Consumer Freight Stations (CFS), warehousing and cold stations.
